title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Santa Monica Mountains, California
content:
Photo submitted by Dan Lucas, “Taking a break in the Santa Monica mountains on a beautiful Winter day.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Santa Monica Mountains, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
